marklogic.body: It would really Depend on what type of books that they were interested in reading - I tend to prefer books that have Heat - but aren't scorching. So I would recommend the Bridgerton series by Julia Quinn, the Wallflower series by Lisa Kleypas, Julie Anne Long - anything and everything she writes, Vicky Dreiling, Sarah Maclean (everything she writes including her first YA book, The Season). If they wanted a book that tears their heart out and jumps up and down on it before putting it back in - then I would suggest Eileen Dreyers Never a Gentleman.
